document_data.name: These Men of Zhentil Keep
document_data.mainbody:
'''''These Men of Zhentil Keep''''' was a crude sea shanty popular among pirates and buccaneers of the [[Moonshae Isles]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. {{quote|''They're far from staid after a raid,
These men of [[Zhentil Keep]].
They kill off all the women,
For they much prefer the [[sheep]].

The men don't eat their ill-got treat.
Not one of them's a glutton.
So isn't it a marvel
That they always smell of mutton?''|[[Tzigone]], the hero of the [[Battle of Akhlaur's Swamp]]}}
document_data.History: The song was brought to the southern [[wizard]]ly nation of [[Halruaa]] by an infamous 14{{th}} century DR pirate named [[Old Bess]] who, in exchange for care and healing, taught navigation, tides, currents, and shared tales of fierce sea battles at the [[Jordaini College]].
